There are four major use cases that we will be developing initially for ICEBERG. More detailed information and code may be found at our [github site](https://github.com/iceberg-project). 

Application #1: Polar glaciology and geomorphology using 4D change detection

Application #2: Arctic hydrology

Application #3: Biological feature detection

Application #4: Geological land cover classification
